notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Investigation, M.D., A.V., S.A.P., C.L., G.B. and O.C.; resources, M.D.; writing—original draft preparation, M.D., A.V. and C.B.-G.; writing—review and editing, M.D., A.V. and C.B.-G.; conceptualization, C.B.-G.; formal analysis, C.B.-G. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
